about_the_game:
Anime Shop Simulator is fun first-person simulation where you become the manager of your very own anime shop!

Play solo or join forces with friends in online co-op to expand your shop, attract more customers, and create the ultimate otaku and trading card paradise!

MANAGE YOUR SHOP

Build your dream Anime Shop! Arrange manga, figures, and collectible cards on the shelves to create a seamless and enjoyable shopping experience for your customers.

CO-OP GAMEPLAY

Join forces with your friends online in 4-player co-op mode to manage your anime shop together, divide responsibilities, and plan strategies to maximize your profits.

ORDER PRODUCTS

Stock your anime shop with a variety of manga, collectible card packs, and anime merchandise.

COLLECT THEM ALL!

Unbox booster packs and discover unique treasures! Find rare collectible cards to sell for a profit or keep them to complete your ultimate anime card collection.

CUSTOMIZATION

Transform your anime store into a one-of-a-kind otaku haven! Choose your favorite wallpaper, give your shop a unique name, and decorate it with items to reflect your personal style.

EVENTS AND FESTIVALS

Host autograph signings and trading card tournaments for anime fans to draw in more customers and boost your store’s popularity!

GROW

Enlarge your shop, upgrade its decor, and stay in tune with the dynamic trends of the anime industry to remain competitive.

In Anime Shop Simulator your decisions shape your journey. Can you transform your small boutique into a thriving otaku hub while balancing customer satisfaction and financial success?

Anime Shop Simulator is fun first-person simulation where you become the manager of your very own anime shop!

Play solo or join forces with friends in online co-op to expand your shop, attract more customers, and create the ultimate otaku and trading card paradise!

MANAGE YOUR SHOP

Build your dream Anime Shop! Arrange manga, figures, and collectible cards on the shelves to create a seamless and enjoyable shopping experience for your customers.

CO-OP GAMEPLAY

Join forces with your friends online in 4-player co-op mode to manage your anime shop together, divide responsibilities, and plan strategies to maximize your profits.

ORDER PRODUCTS

Stock your anime shop with a variety of manga, collectible card packs, and anime merchandise.

COLLECT THEM ALL!

Unbox booster packs and discover unique treasures! Find rare collectible cards to sell for a profit or keep them to complete your ultimate anime card collection.

CUSTOMIZATION

Transform your anime store into a one-of-a-kind otaku haven! Choose your favorite wallpaper, give your shop a unique name, and decorate it with items to reflect your personal style.

EVENTS AND FESTIVALS

Host autograph signings and trading card tournaments for anime fans to draw in more customers and boost your store’s popularity!

GROW

Enlarge your shop, upgrade its decor, and stay in tune with the dynamic trends of the anime industry to remain competitive.

In Anime Shop Simulator your decisions shape your journey. Can you transform your small boutique into a thriving otaku hub while balancing customer satisfaction and financial success?
name: Anime Shop Simulator ✨

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz or Ryzen 3xxx
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Manage your own anime shop 🎌. Play solo or team up with friends 🤝 in 4-player co-op mode to grow your business 📈 Stock shelves with manga, figures, and collectible cards in this immersive first-person game 🕹️.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish
